title: Building an Inner Sanctuary
description: Through experiential methodologies of self-leadership and mind-body practices, this course encourages students to discover and flex those internal resources which enhance resilience, foster psycho-emotional and community-building skills, and affirm their cultural dignity. Enrollment is by application and permission of the instructor. First-pass enrollment is restricted to Oakes students. Second-pass enrollment open to all students.

pre_req_data.text: First-pass enrollment is restricted to Oakes students. Second-pass enrollment is open to all students.
